subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that configure the Sankey UI component's contents, behavior and appearance.

subMembers.name: adaptiveLayout
subMembers.description: Specifies adaptive layout properties.

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum container height at which the layout begins to adapt.

subMembers.name: keepLabels
subMembers.description: Specifies whether [node labels] should be kept when the UI component adapts the layout.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum container width at which the layout begins to adapt.

subMembers.name: alignment
subMembers.description: Aligns node columns vertically.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | String | Array<any> | null
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to data.

subMembers.name: hoverEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether nodes and links change their style when they are hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Configures the labels' borders.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors the labels' borders.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the borders are visible.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Sets the borders' width in pixels.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Customizes the labels' texts.

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies the labels' font properties.

subMembers.name: horizontalOffset
subMembers.description: Moves the labels horizontally from their initial positions.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Configures sankey nodes' labels.

subMembers.name: overlappingBehavior
subMembers.description: Specifies how to arrange labels when there is insufficient space to display them all.

subMembers.name: blur
subMembers.description: Specifies the shadows' blur distance. A larger value increases the blur distance.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors the labels' shadows.

subMembers.name: offsetX
subMembers.description: Moves the shadows horizontally from their initial positions.

subMembers.name: offsetY
subMembers.description: Moves the shadows vertically from their initial positions.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the shadows' transparency.

subMembers.name: shadow
subMembers.description: Configures the labels' shadows.

subMembers.name: useNodeColors
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to color labels in the nodes' colors.

subMembers.name: verticalOffset
subMembers.description: Moves the labels vertically from their initial positions.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the labels are visible.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Configures the links' borders.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors the links' borders.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the borders are visible.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Sets the borders' width in pixels.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors the sankey links. Applies only if [colorMode] is *"none"*.

subMembers.name: colorMode
subMembers.description: Specifies how to color links.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Configures the appearance a link's border changes to when the link is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the color a link's border changes to when the link is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a link's border is visible when the link is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width a link's border changes to when the link is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the color a link changes to when it is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: direction
subMembers.description: Specifies hatching lines' direction.

subMembers.name: hatching
subMembers.description: Applies hatching to a link when it is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies hatching lines' transparency.

subMembers.name: step
subMembers.description: Specifies the distance in pixels between two hatching lines.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies hatching lines' width.

subMembers.name: hoverStyle
subMembers.description: Configures the appearance a link changes to when it is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the transparency a link changes to when it is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: link
subMembers.description: Configures sankey links' appearance.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the links' transparency.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Configures the nodes' borders.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors the nodes' borders.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the borders are visible.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Sets the borders' width in pixels.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors the sankey nodes.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Configures the appearance a node's border changes to when the node is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the color a node's border changes to when the node is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a node's border is visible when the node is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width a node's border changes to when the node is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the color a node changes to when it is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: direction
subMembers.description: Specifies hatching lines' direction.

subMembers.name: hatching
subMembers.description: Applies hatching to a node when it is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies hatching lines' transparency.

subMembers.name: step
subMembers.description: Specifies the distance in pixels between two hatching lines.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies hatching lines' width.

subMembers.name: hoverStyle
subMembers.description: Configures the appearance a node changes to when it is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the transparency a node changes to when it is hovered over or pressed.

subMembers.name: node
subMembers.description: Configures sankey nodes' appearance.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the nodes' transparency.

subMembers.name: padding
subMembers.description: Specifies the vertical distance, in pixels, between two nodes.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the nodes' width in pixels.

subMembers.name: palette
subMembers.description: Sets the palette to be used to colorize sankey nodes.

subMembers.name: paletteExtensionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies how to extend the [palette] when it contains less colors than the number of sankey nodes.

subMembers.name: sortData
subMembers.description: Specifies nodes' sorting order in their columns.

subMembers.name: sourceField
subMembers.description: Specifies which data source field provides links' source nodes.

subMembers.name: targetField
subMembers.description: Specifies which data source field provides links' target nodes.

subMembers.name: customizeLinkTooltip
subMembers.description: Customizes link tooltips' appearance.

subMembers.name: customizeNodeTooltip
subMembers.description: Customizes node tooltips' appearance.

subMembers.name: linkTooltipComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [linkTooltipTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: linkTooltipRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [linkTooltipTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: linkTooltipTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for a [link]'s tooltip.

subMembers.name: nodeTooltipComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [nodeTooltipTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: nodeTooltipRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [nodeTooltipTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: nodeTooltipTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for a [node]'s tooltip.

subMembers.name: weightField
subMembers.description: Specifies which data source field provides links' weights.

subMembers.name: Fields
subMembers.description: Fields that provide information about the sankey node.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: The node's label.

subMembers.name: linksIn
subMembers.description: The node's incoming links.

subMembers.name: linksOut
subMembers.description: The node's outgoing links.

subMembers.name: Node
subMembers.description: A sankey node's structure.

subMembers.name: Fields
subMembers.description: Fields that provide information about the sankey link.

subMembers.name: connection
subMembers.description: An object that describes the connection.

subMembers.name: Link
subMembers.description: A sankey link's structure.

properties.name: dxSankey
properties.description: The Sankey is a UI component that visualizes the flow magnitude between value sets. The values being connected are called nodes; the connections - links. The higher the flow magnitude, the wider the link is.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onDrawn
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component's rendering has finished.

Events.name: onExported
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component is exported.

Events.name: onExporting
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is exported.

Events.name: onFileSaving
Events.description: A function that is executed before a file with exported UI component is saved to the user's local storage.

Events.name: onIncidentOccurred
Events.description: A function that is executed when an error or warning occurs.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onLinkClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a sankey link is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onLinkHoverChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after the pointer enters or leaves a sankey link.

Events.name: onNodeClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a sankey node is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onNodeHoverChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after the pointer enters or leaves a sankey node.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: linkClick
Events.description: Raised when a sankey link is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: linkHoverChanged
Events.description: Raised after the pointer enters or leaves a sankey link.

Events.name: nodeClick
Events.description: Raised when a sankey node is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: nodeHoverChanged
Events.description: Raised after the pointer enters or leaves a sankey node.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DrawnEvent
Types.description: The type of the [drawn] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ExportedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [exported] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ExportingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [exporting] event handler's argument.

Types.name: FileSavingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [fileSaving] event handler's argument.

Types.name: IncidentOccurredEvent
Types.description: The type of the [incidentOccurred] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: LinkClickEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [linkClick] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: LinkHoverEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [linkHoverChanged] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: NodeClickEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [nodeClick] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: NodeHoverEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [nodeHoverChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: customizeLinkTooltip
subMembers.description: Customizes link tooltips' appearance.

subMembers.name: customizeNodeTooltip
subMembers.description: Customizes node tooltips' appearance.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the tooltip is enabled.

subMembers.name: linkTooltipTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for a [link]'s tooltip.

subMembers.name: nodeTooltipTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for a [node]'s tooltip.
